resources.string: This quiz section consists of a question within the field of mathematics
This quiz section will test your knowledge of the science of physics
This quiz section gives you the chance to show off your marvel comic knowledge
There will be 1 question \n Press begin when you are ready to start!
An orchestra of 120 players performs Beethoven\'s 9th Symphony in 40 minutes, how long would it take for 60 players to perform the same piece?
What kind of energy does a boulder on the edge of a cliff represent?
What vehicle is the Avenger\'s primary mode of transportation?
Sorry but the right answer was: %s
